name: @mcmics/exiftool.pl
description: A distribution of exiftool perl executable.

scripts.download: rm -rf vendor; curl -L https://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/exiftool/Image-ExifTool-12.24.tar.gz | tar xz; mv Image-ExifTool-12.24 vendor; cd vendor; ls | grep -v 'lib\|exiftool' | xargs rm -r

author: Anton <anton@sobesednik.media>
